name: 行星地質學
comment: 中階以上課程，適合大三以上學生修習，以作為探究研究所之先修課程，同時也開放碩士班無此課程基礎之學生選修。
goals: Students will have a greater understanding for the origin of terrestrial bodies
The use of remote sensing for interpretation geological events
Using chemistry to understand extraterrestrial materials (e.g. meteors)
Understanding the unique properties of the Earth
syllabus:
【18 weeks】

Week 1 Introduction

Week 2 Origin of the Solar System

Week 3 Model of Planetary Evolution

Week 4 Meteorites and Impact Craters

Week 5 The Earth-Moon System

Week 6 Mercury (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 7 Venus (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 8 Mars (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 9 Asteroids

Week 10 Galilean Satellites (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 11 Titan (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 12 Triton (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 13 Pluto and Charon (Surface features, Geological Processes, Atmosphere, Climate)

Week 14 Comets

Week 15 Extrasolar Planets

There will be three weeks for exams and presentations

grading.note: Presentation of term paper and class discussion involvement
A 4000 word term paper on a specific topic (selected by the student in conjunction with the professor) is required

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
